title: Header Semantic Element
description: Introductory content - titles, subtitles, navigation, logos. Used within article, section, or body.

$inheritance.reason: Header IS-A element with all base properties

role: banner (when child of body) or generic

semanticMeaning.description: Introductory content for its nearest sectioning content ancestor
semanticMeaning.whenToUse: Group of introductory or navigational aids

title.description: Primary heading text - ALWAYS canvas editable

subtitle.description: Secondary heading text - ALWAYS canvas editable

metadata.description: Additional info like date, author, category

textProperties.description: ALL of these are canvas-editable when they have content
textProperties.rule: If property has value, element is rendered and editable

conditionalRendering.title: Render h3 only if title is not empty
conditionalRendering.subtitle: Render p only if subtitle is not empty

requirements: Header should contain at least one heading element (h1-h6)
Heading level should be appropriate for document outline
